text: hi everyone today let's make the steamed
layer tapioca cake is a very beautiful
dessert and very delicious at the same
time in Vietnamese is called banh yellow
which literally means pig skin cake
making this Katie not that difficult so
let's start
the ingredients you will need our 200
gram of tapioca - 50 gram rice flour 250
gram sugar one can of coconut milk and
200 gram of cooked mung beans to cook
the mung bean I wash 100 gram of the
peeled mung beans until the water become
clear and then soak them in water for an
hour after that I add in water and cook
in the rice cooker the water level
should be just as high at the beans if
you don't have a rice cooker after
soaking the bean for 1 hour you can
steam them for 15 minutes or until they
are soft next we dissolve 250 gram of
sugar in one can of coconut milk and 300
ml water you can stir on low heat until
the sugar is completely dissolved add to
that black come to room temperature
next we mix the tapioca starch with the
rice flour and the coconut mixture
stall really well until you get a very
smooth batter you can strain the mixture
to make sure that there is no lump
inside and don't forget to add in a
pinch of salt next we divide the batter
into two portions one a little more than
the other the smaller portion should be
around one and a half cup next we add
some pandan extract to the bigger
portion this will make the green part of
the cake the pandan extract also give
the cake a very nice blending flavor
for the yellow layer we're going to
blend the co2 mung bean with the smaller
portion of the batter then plan it
really well until smooth
next we grease the pan with some
vegetable oil
and by the water in the steamer if you
don't have a steamer you can do like me
here okay so when the water in the
steamer start to boil we add into later
of the green layer cover the lid and
steam for about three to four minutes to
avoid the water dripping into the cake
you can wrap the lid with the kitchen
towel like this when the green layer is
slightly set we can add into later of
the yellow batter make sure the lower
layer is slightly set before we add in a
new layer because we don't want them to
mix up but we also don't want them to be
too separated so steam each layer just a
few minutes only and not too long okay
so just continue until you finish the
better you can make this kit in a pan or
in small mouth like this
after the last layer steam the whole
cake for another 15 minutes
when you poke the center of the cake
with a chopstick and you see no better
spilling out is done for example here
the ha shape one should be stimulated or
longer and this small one is done
already make sure you let the cake cool
completely before you unmold and cut
them look how beautiful these cakes are
he it's already very delicious but I
still want to make it more perfect I
want it to be a little softer and has
the natural fresh pending flavor so I
bought a bunch of fresh pandan leaves
and chopped up about 6 of them
after that a planet with Humber ml water
in a food processor
then I strain it and get hundred ml
pending water the color is very natural
very green and very fragrant
then I add to the bigger portion of the
batter instead of depending extract so
we get a very natural green color very
beautiful and fragrant and I also strain
it to make sure the batter is completely
smooth so these are the batter is a
little more equally than the previous
time but I want the case softer so it's
gonna be good
so I steamed the better layer by layer
than the previous time and this is what
I get
the cake is set but still soft which is
much more to my liking of course I have
let it cool completely and now I'm gonna
cut it
to have a smooth cut I greased the knife
with some vegetable oil normally they
cut into your diamond shape but you can
just cut into whatever shape that you
like you can serve this cake within a
day or you can keep it in the fridge for
two to three days if you eat on the next
day you can microwave for about thirty
Seconds to 45 seconds and then let it
cool and it's good to it again the
layers are even the cake is soft and
glutinous and it has great flavor of
pang gang and mumbling is a perfect cake
to serve in the afternoon with a cup of
hot tea so I hope you enjoy making and
eating this cake as much as I did thank
you for watching bye bye
you
